file.name: /Users/jgera.ctr/Documents/JAVA/ms-bitbucket/cre-ms-retail/src/main/java/com/tenx/ms/retail/store/rest/StoreController.java
file.violation: Only variables that are final should contain underscores (except for underscores in standard prefix/suffix), 'store_id' is not final.
Consider simply returning the value vs storing it in local variable 'store_id'
